customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: This vest seems to be well made. I have owned several Columbia products and they have been long lasting. I debated about the size (Small or Medium) based on other reviewers comments that the vests tend to be a little large. I selected the Medium and the fit is very good. I think the Small would have been a little too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana User

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, True to Size, Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Warmer than my name brand down vests. XL and XXL true to size and fit well. Bodily length was very good. (I wear 36-37 inch sleeve, and typically need a tall, this did not come in tall but length was good, much better than most) Product finish was good, material good and water resistant). Recommend, bought one for son. He also loves. I wear vests everyday in winter, this will be my new favorite
customer_reviews.author: edward p weigelt jr

customer_reviews.title: Toasty
customer_reviews.text: It fits a bit long on the backside but boy it keeps me warm! They have made it adjustable so you can draw it in on the water etc. I like the pocket tabs with the lanyard because it helps when wearing gloves. It's low pile so I believe that I can ride with it under my motorcycle jacket as well.

product_meta.title: Columbia Men’s Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Vest, Thermal Reflective Warmth
product_meta.description: Your ability to stay warm in blowing snow and freezing temperatures is enhanced when your core retains heat and warmth. It’s well understood that if the center of your body retains heat, the rest of your body follows. With that in mind, Columbia has developed this winter vest to keep your core warm. The Columbia Men’s Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Vest retains core body heat and is one of the warmest, softest, and lightest vests made by Columbia. Our Columbia winter vest is made from down-style baffling that is flexible, provides cushioning, and delivers a timeless versatile fit—without wearing thin over time. This extends product life and keeps you comfortable. This core-warmer vest has been engineered to keep you toasty with our performance-enhanced down—a combination of 40 g Omni-Heat synthetic insulation, 550-fill goose down, and thermal-reflective lining. This Columbia winter vest water-resistant shell with grid baffling provides a snug, close-to-body feel that is anything but bulky. It has been certified to the Responsible Down Standard (RDS) by Control Union. The Columbia Men’s Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Vest contains multiple convenient features including a drawcord adjustable hem and interior security pocket. The vest is packable into the interior pocket and has zippered hand pockets to keep your items safe and secure. This men’s winter vest is offered on Amazon.com in multiple sizes that range from small to XXL. You can choose from a variety colors including black, graphite, mossy green, mountain red, and super blue.
